Uses of Class
javax.time.temporal.WeekDefinition

  • Packages that use WeekDefinition 
    Package Description
    javax.time.temporal
    Access to date and time using fields and units, additional value type classes and base support for calendar systems other than the default ISO.

    • Uses of WeekDefinition in javax.time.temporal

      Fields in javax.time.temporal declared as WeekDefinition 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static WeekDefinition WeekDefinition.ISO
      The ISO-8601 definition, where a week starts on Monday and the first week has a minimum of 4 days.
      static WeekDefinition WeekDefinition.SUNDAY_START
      The common definition of a week that starts on Sunday.
      Methods in javax.time.temporal that return WeekDefinition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WeekDefinition WeekDefinition.of(DayOfWeek firstDayOfWeek, int minimalDaysInFirstWeek)
      Obtains an instance of WeekDefinition from the first day-of-week and minimal days.
      static WeekDefinition WeekDefinition.of(Locale locale)
      Obtains an instance of WeekDefinition appropriate for a locale.
